mapper.select: SELECT user_name as username, password as password FROM sys_user WHERE user_name = #{userName} or phone = #{phone}

SELECT sm.url FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.menu_id = sm.uuid LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.uuid = srm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = sr.uuid LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.uuid = sur.user_id where user_name = #{userName}
